title: Archive
subtitle: Explore our past events and achievements

messages.cannotArchiveScraped: Cannot archive scraped events. Only internal events can be archived.
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this archive entry? This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmUnarchive: Are you sure you want to unarchive this event? The archive entry will be deleted.
messages.maxPhotosReached: Maximum 20 photos allowed per archived event
messages.maxVideosReached: Maximum 5 videos allowed per archived event
messages.invalidYoutubeUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube URL
messages.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please use JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF.
messages.eventRestoredDesc: The event has been moved back to the calendar

emptyStates.noArchivesDesc: Start archiving your past events to showcase your achievements
emptyStates.noPhotosDesc: Upload photos to document this event
emptyStates.noVideosDesc: Add YouTube videos to showcase this event
emptyStates.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters

dialog.archiveEventDesc: Add additional details to create a rich archive entry for this event.
dialog.createArchiveDesc: Add a new archived event directly without linking to an existing event
dialog.editArchiveDesc: Update the archive details and media for this event.
dialog.uploadPhotosDesc: Upload up to {{remaining}} more photos ({{current}}/20 used)
dialog.addVideoDesc: Paste a YouTube video URL to add it to this archive entry.
dialog.csvImportDesc: Upload a CSV file containing archived events. Download the template for the correct format.

validation.attendeesOrHighlights: Please provide either actual attendees or highlights to create a meaningful archive entry

admin.title: Archive Management
admin.subtitle: Manage archived events and media
admin.internalEventsOnlyDesc: Only internal (non-scraped) events can be archived

editArchiveDesc: Update the archive details and media for this event.
photoStorageUnavailable: Photo storage service is currently unavailable
csvRequiredColumns: Required columns: name or name_ar, start_date. Optional columns: description, location, actual_attendees, highlights, impact, and more.

detail.noPhotosForEvent: No photos available for this event
detail.noVideosForEvent: No videos available for this event

archiveDialog.title: Archive Event to Al Hasad
archiveDialog.description: Add this event to the Al Hasad archive with optional additional details
archiveDialog.addMoreLater: You can add more details and photos later from the Archive Management page
archiveDialog.archivedDesc: Event has been moved to Al Hasad archive
